New Records: Malik Monk scored a season-high 31 points
Key Match Events: Monk scored 11 of his 31 points in the fourth quarter to help close out the game for the Kings
De'Aaron Fox was called for a flagrant foul on Scotty Pippen Jr.
Jaren Jackson Jr. was called for a flagrant when he hip-checked Fox going up for a dunk
Post-Match Reflections: The Kings look like they are finding their identity as a team that is going to outwork their opponent, which is an absolute joy to watch develop
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jaylen Wells scored a career-high 30 points on a hyper-efficient 8-of-9, 88.9%, from the field
The Kings shot 21-of-47, 44.7%, from beyond the arc with seven players making a three
Trey Lyles continued his strong play off the bench shooting a perfect 4-for-4 from deep
